title: E-commerce API
description: Create a RESTful API for an e-commerce platform that handles products, users, orders, and payments. The API should be secure, scalable, and well-documented.
features: User authentication and authorization with JWT
additionalContext: The API should follow RESTful best practices and include proper error handling with appropriate status codes. All endpoints should be thoroughly documented using Swagger/OpenAPI. Include unit and integration tests to ensure reliability. The database schema should be optimized for e-commerce operations with proper indexing.
